main.java.controllerandview

Class CommonGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.controllerandview.CommonGUI

  • public class CommonGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores static methods and other stuff useful for all GUI classes in project

      static MikePosOrders setMikePos(CommonGUI.ICommonGUI setMikePosOrdersTarget, MainModelThread model, PriceServer priceServer)
      Sets MikePosOrders inside class implementing ICommonGUI if priceServer is supplied - MikePosOrders available for choosing will be for the instrument traded by that priceserver if it is null - attempts to get the priceserver from the class implementing the ICommonGUI interface based on user choice in dialog

      Sets the PriceServer in setPriceServerTarget according to user choice in a JavaFX Dialog pop-up window.

    • Method Detail

      • placeMultipleOrder

        public static void placeMultipleOrder(CommonGUI.GUICommandMultipleOrder command,
                                      javafx.scene.control.TextField multipleAmount,
                                      javafx.scene.control.TextField multipleDistance,
                                      MikeOrder.MikeOrderType orderType,
                                      int pricePressed)
        If you want to fire off different algos or orders on consecutive prices you can use this. Create a class that implements GUICommandMultipleOrder with the parameters you want and implement command() inside GUICommandMultipleOrder however you wish. command() gets called multiple times by depending on what is entered into TextField multipleAmount, TextField multipleDistance

      • setMikePos

        public static MikePosOrders setMikePos(CommonGUI.ICommonGUI setMikePosOrdersTarget,
                                       MainModelThread model,
                                       PriceServer priceServer)
        Sets MikePosOrders inside class implementing ICommonGUI if priceServer is supplied - MikePosOrders available for choosing will be for the instrument traded by that priceserver if it is null - attempts to get the priceserver from the class implementing the ICommonGUI interface based on user choice in dialog
        Parameters:
        setMikePosOrdersTarget -
        model -
        priceServer -

      • placeOnSameMonitor

        public static void placeOnSameMonitor(javafx.stage.Stage sourceStage,
                                      javafx.stage.Stage newStage,
                                      int XPos,
                                      int YPos)
        Use this to place a (new) stage on the same monitor as the stage that you clicked a button in
        Parameters:
        sourceStage - the stage on which a button was clicked
        newStage - the stage on which to place the new window
        XPos - XPosition of new window
        YPos - YPosition of new window

      • getIntFromTextfield

        public static int getIntFromTextfield(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField,
                                      int defaultValue)
        Tries to parse the TextField submitted and return an int value. If parsing throws an exception, returns the defaultValue passed in as parameter
        Parameters:
        textField - field to retrieve int from
        defaultValue - this gets returned if textField has non-int string input by user
        Returns:
